mapper.sql: (SELECT u.hp_user_id FROM hp_user u WHERE u.user_token=#{sid})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*,c.com_name,ps.lower_num,ps.hight_num,aco.county_name,aci.city_name,pr.*, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(pw.welfare_name) FROM hp_position_ref_welfare prw JOIN hp_position_welfare pw WHERE prw.hp_position_id=p.hp_position_id AND prw.hp_position_welfare_id=pw.hp_position_welfare_id) welfareArr FROM hp_position p JOIN hp_company c ON p.hp_company_id=c.hp_company_id JOIN hp_position_salary ps ON p.hp_position_salary_id=ps.hp_position_salary_id JOIN hp_area_county aco ON p.county_id=aco.county_id JOIN hp_area_city aci ON aco.city_id=aci.city_id JOIN hp_position_require pr ON p.hp_position_require_id=pr.hp_position_require_id WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{hpPositionId}

SELECT pg.*,u.user_name,u.header_pic,c.com_name,p.pos_name,ps.lower_num,ps.hight_num, @part_num:=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru WHERE pru.hp_position_group_id=pg.hp_position_group_id) partNum, (pg.end_time-#{curTime}) leftTime FROM hp_company c JOIN hp_position p ON c.hp_company_id=p.hp_company_id JOIN hp_position_group pg ON p.hp_position_id=pg.hp_position_id LEFT JOIN hp_user u ON pg.hp_user_id=u.hp_user_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_salary ps ON p.hp_position_salary_id=ps.hp_position_salary_id WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{curTime} AND p.group_on=1 AND pg.end_time>#{curTime} AND @part_num <3 ORDER BY pg.end_time LIMIT #{currentResult},#{showCount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position p JOIN hp_position_group pg ON p.hp_position_id=pg.hp_position_id WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{curTime} AND p.group_on=1 AND pg.end_time>#{curTime} AND @part_num <3

SELECT pg.*,c.com_name,p.pos_name,pru.hp_user_id,u.header_pic,ps.lower_num,ps.hight_num, p.pos_com_desc,CASE WHEN pg.end_time>1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ,CASE WHEN pg.end_time>1 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END groupStatus, (pg.end_time-#{curTime}) leftTime,
IF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hp_position_ref_user pru1 WHERE pru1.hp_user_id=)>0,1,0) userIsPart
0 userIsPart
FROM hp_company c JOIN hp_position p ON c.hp_company_id=p.hp_company_id JOIN hp_position_group pg ON p.hp_position_id=pg.hp_position_id JOIN hp_position_ref_user pru ON pg.hp_position_group_id=pru.hp_position_group_id JOIN hp_user u ON pru.hp_user_id=u.hp_user_id LEFT JOIN hp_position_salary ps ON p.hp_position_salary_id=ps.hp_position_salary_id WHERE pg.hp_position_group_id=#{hpPositionGroupId}
SELECT p.hp_position_id,p.start_time,p.end_time,p.group_on FROM hp_position p WHERE p.hp_position_id=#{hpPositionId}
